name: Crestfallen Sellsword
description: Life has become the equivalent of a maggot riddled ditch. Ignored in streets, passed upon by knights, nothing more than a shade. The days of glory and gold are dead, you were once of repute. Something in that last tankard of rotgut lifted your spirits… or what is left of them. A once respected swordsman, now just another forgotten soul in a world tormented by death.
